Package org.apache.pluto

Interface Summary
PortletContainer The PortletContainer interface is the entrance point of the portlet container.
 

Class Summary
Constants This class defines a bunch of constants, especially those needed to identify attributes in the servlet request/session.
PortletContainerImpl Implements the Pluto Container.
PortletContainerServices  
 

Exception Summary
PortletContainerException The PortletContainerException class defines a general exception that the portlet container can throw when it encounters difficulty.
